Welcome on the Eklaweb technical blog

Published :

21 May 2012

Tags :

  • general (1 post)

The Eklaweb technical blog

Here at eklaweb we like to take up technical challenges. This blog will be the place where our engineers will publish articles about the most interesting ones.

We’ll be talking mainly about Scala, functionnal programming, HTML5 mobile development with or without Phonegap / Cordova and JS-intensive web applications.
